title: Enchanting Table
desc:
Post 849
- When stood on, you can add an <:enchantment:1107516323426213888> to any card to draw.
- You do not get to see the card before you <:enchantment:1107516323426213888> it.
- This card is of the Stone subtype.
- This card takes 5 hits to break with a tool that is not meant for it.
- This card cannot be drawn, and instead replaces an 806 if it is placed next to a 796.
